item.title: Hundreds line up to vote in Georgia elections that will set control of US Senate
item.description: Hundreds of people lined up in a cold rain on Monday to cast ballots in a pair of US Senate races in Georgia that will determine control of the chamber and heavily influence Democratic President-elect Joe Biden's ability to enact his agenda.

item.title: Canada administers country's first COVID-19 vaccination
item.description: Canada kicked off its inoculation campaign against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) on Monday by injecting frontline healthcare workers, becoming just the third nation in the world to administer the Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine.

item.title: Italy reports 491 COVID-19 deaths on Monday, 12,030 new cases
item.description: Italy reported 491 coronavirus-related deaths on Monday against 484 the day before, the health ministry said, while the daily tally of new infections declined to 12,030 from 17,938.

item.title: Isang mananaya, nanalo ng mahigit P166M jackpot prize sa lotto 6/45
item.description: Nasolo ng isang mananaya ang mahigit P166 milyon na jackpot prize sa lotto 6/45 draw nitong Lunes ng gabi, Disyembre 14, 2020.

item.title: Iran's Rouhani defends execution of captured dissident journalist Zam
item.description: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani defended Saturday's execution of a prominent dissident journalist based in France and captured by Iran last year, saying the death sentence passed on Ruhollah Zam was carried out lawfully.

item.title: Pinoy nurse sa UK, ibinahagi ang naramdaman isang araw matapos mabigyan ng COVID-19 vaccine
item.description: Ilang araw makaraang maturukan ng COVID-19 vaccine, kinumusta ang pakiramdam ng isang Filipino nurse sa United Kingdom kung may nararamdaman ba siyang side effect sa gamot.

item.title: Ano ang pagkakaiba ng Nummular Eczema at Psoriasis?
item.description: Makati at mapupulang mga pantal na kumakalat sa iba't ibang parte ng katawan, bunga ba ito ng sakit sa balat na Nummular Eczema o ng Psoriasis? Alamin ang kaibahan ng naturang mga sakit sa balat at paano nga ba ito maiiwasan?

item.title: Greenhills night market shifts focus to food amid pandemic
item.description: With fewer shoppers flocking to malls amid the coronavirus pandemic, the Greenhills Shopping Center decided to put the focus on food rather than the toys and clothes that its night market was previously known for to increase foot traffic.

item.title: 2 dead in Baclaran shooting incident
item.description: Two people died after suspects riding-in-tandem opened fire in Baclaran, ParaÃ±aque on Monday night.

item.title: Human Rights Day 7 insist firearms planted
item.description: Some of the seven individuals including one journalist who were arrested on International Human Rights Day last week said the firearms and explosives were merely planted by police.

item.title: New York nurse receives first COVID-19 vaccine in US
item.description: A nurse in New York became the first person in the United States to receive the coronavirus vaccine Monday.

item.title: Wish ng isang babae, matupad kaya kapag nakompleto niya ng Simbang Gabi?
item.description: May mga paniniwala na matutupad ang hiling ng isang tao kapag nakompleto niya ang Simbang Gabi. Si Ella, bumabalik ang alaala nang mag-wish siya noon sa simbang gabi nang makita niya sa simbahan ang lalaking nagpatibok ng kaniyang puso sa unang pagkakataon--pero isang seminarista.

item.title: UP Diliman to pay delayed salaries of researchers by end of week
item.description: The University of the Philippines Diliman on Monday said it will be able to pay the delayed salaries of its science research assistants (RA) "by the end of the week."

item.title: House OKs bill extending availability of Bayanihan 2 funds
item.description: The House of Representatives on Monday approved on second and third reading the measure seeking to extend the availability of funds under the Bayanihan to Recover As One Act until June 30, 2021 amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: 4 nabbed for using fake COVID-19 antigen test results to enter Ilocos Norte
item.description: Four people were arrested in Badoc, Ilocos Norte for attempting to enter the province by presenting falsified COVID-19 antigen test results.
